aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: We are a world-leading international company
aboutUs.description:
OVER 7 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE we deliver quality and reliability! Mega Tel has specialized in processing inbound calls since 2015. We are successful together with our clients because we carry out the best possible integration of our activities into existing work processes in both temporary and long-term projects. Our employees make phone calls every day for many companies and in many areas of responsibility. Our work experience includes tasks such as telephone secretariat, switchboard, order taking, customer service, information service, information and customer care, as well as all back office tasks.



As a professional service center, we deliver tailor-made outsourcing solutions for companies nationally and internationally.  We support you in inbound, market research, sales, sales, lead generation, advertising, whether market research, sales, order acceptance, first level support or complaint management.

contact.mainBranchDescription: Would you like to learn more about how MegaTel can advance your business? Contact us for tailored advice. We look forward to working with you and achieving your communication goals. Discover the world of first-class call center services with MegaTel - your reliable partner for excellent communication!
